attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aqua Trick
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokémon, this effect does nothing.
